pullRequest.title: Fix signature Help shows the first parameter for the langlib functions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Signature Help shows the first parameter for the langlib functions

Fixes #21741
Approach

Describe how you are implementing the solutions along with the design details.

Samples

Provide high-level details about the samples related to this feature.

Remarks

List any other known issues, related PRs, TODO items, or any other notes related to the PR.

Check List

nodes.bodyText:
This will capture all the langlib function symbols. I think here we need to capture the following case as well, where we need to show the hint for the first parameter, shall we cover that particular case well?
var s = 'int:abs(<cursor>)
